mapper.insert: insert into member (memberIdx, memberId, password, memberName, sex, birth, email, phone, address1, address2) values (member_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{password}, #{memberName}, #{sex}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address1}, #{address2})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password}, email= #{email}, phone= #{phone}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2} where memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into pet (petIdx, memberIdx, animalRegistrationNo, petName, sex, birth) values (pet_seq.nextval, #{memberIdx}, #{animalRegistrationNo}, #{petName}, #{sex}, #{birth})
